data.title: Home
data.text:
NexRev Freedom Enterprise is a powerful EMS/BMS system for the remote management and monitoring of HVACs and devices – leveraging the cloud and IoT to control your energy costs, from a central console.

Comprehensive, Freedom Enterprise gives your business:

AI-based insights and continuous energy consumption optimization

Customized reports and rich data export

Real-time control of all your devices, with simple integration

Instant analytics for informed decisions, from a single multi-site view

NexRev Panel collects and mediates all data from your remote devices, providing a gateway to Freedom Enterprise in the cloud. It enables bi-directional communication, giving you full control over your multi-site installation.

Control lighting, HVACs, fuel pumps, and more

Integrate with proprietary devices

Consolidates local data and delivers to the cloud

Delivered by qualified personnel

Bring remote sensors and devices into the Freedom Enterprise cloud to optimize energy consumption and reduce waste. We have deep experience of integration, spanning APIs, standard protocols, and proprietary interfaces, providing comprehensive coverage.

Build out coverage for every site

Full remote control and monitoring

Rich visibility of every device

Efficient data processing

Our powerful dashboards and workspace give you instant visibility of your remote devices and their settings, allowing you to remotely control conditions for optimum comfort. AI-based recommendations tune to the local environment and need.

Automated changes and operations for your facilities

Machine learning to optimize performance locally

Implement global changes in minutes

Operational and generative AI enabled management

The NexRev solution reduced our energy spend by more than 25% while improving store comfort, giving Conn’s visibility of saving measures as we move forward with growth.

We weren’t sure on how to upgrade our systems until NexRev showed us their BMS solution. They have been very forward thinking to ensure we won’t lose sight of any of our stores as we migrate to the latest framework.

NexRev Freedom provides multiple detailed reports with a simple click. Thank you very much for making our job easier!

NexRev’s DrivePak delivered everything that was promised - and more. The amount of energy used by AC units was slashed immediately. We will continue to retrofit DrivePak onto all of our units. Increasing the longevity of each unit is another major plus for DrivePak.
